base_description: This electrical network is composed of 9 nodes with 13 branches. The passive components include 7 resistive element(s). The circuit is powered by 2 voltage source(s), 2 current source(s). There are no controlled sources in this circuit. Measurement setup includes 1 voltage measurement(s). In total, this circuit comprises 11 circuit elements.

edits.instruction: Replace the 31立 resistor (6) with a 15k立 one.
Replace the 83立 resistive element (2) with a 249立 one.
Modify the value of voltage supply 2 from 19kV to 95kV.
